rooms.name: park gate
rooms.description: You find yourself under a large gate, the entrance to the city park.

rooms.name: work area
rooms.description: You are standing in a work area, there are numerous tools strewn about.

rooms.name: pond
rooms.description: You are at the edge of a small pond, surrounded by reeds.

rooms.name: grove
rooms.description: You are in the park grove. There are tall trees all around you. You hear a few birds chirping.

rooms.name: shed
rooms.description: You are in an old, worn down shed. It smells pretty musty.

rooms.name: lake shore
rooms.description: You are standing on the shore of a medium sized lake. You think you can see some fish down in the rocks.
